author: IGN
description: Take a look at the Console Release Date Trailer for Ebola Village, a first-person classic survival horror game developed by indie_games_studio. Players will solve puzzles, make use of a variety of weapons, and survive at all costs against the relentless undead. Ebola Village is launching on January 23 for PlayStation 4 (PS4), PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, and Nintendo Switch, with the game being available now on PC (Steam).
title: Ebola Village - Official Console Release Date Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the Reveal Trailer for Poppy Playtime: Chapter 5, a new installment in the horror action-adventure series developed by Mob Entertainment. Players will end up face-to-face with the deadliest puppetmaster yet. Solve puzzles, endure treacherous obstacles, and survive at all costs in Poppy Playtime: Chapter 5, launching on February 18 for PC (Steam and Epic Games Store).

#IGN #Gaming
title: Poppy Playtime: Chapter 5 - Official Reveal Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the Official Trailer 2 for Crime 101, a crime action drama distributed by Amazon MGM Studios. Follow the life of crime starring Chris Hemsworth and Halle Berry in Crime 101, in theaters on February 13, 2026.

Set against the sun-bleached grit of Los Angeles, Crime 101 weaves the tale of an elusive thief whose high-stakes heists unfolding along the iconic 101 freeway have mystified police. When he eyes the score of a lifetime with hopes of this being his final job, his path collides with a disillusioned insurance broker who is facing her own crossroads, forcing the two to collaborate. Determined to crack the case, a relentless detective closes in on the operation, raising the stakes even higher. As the multimillion-dollar heist approaches, the line between hunter and hunted begins to blur, and all three are forced to confront the cost of their choices–and the realization that there's no turning back.

Crime 101 stars Chris Hemsworth, Halle Berry, Mark Ruffalo, Barry Keoghan,
title: Crime 101 - Official Trailer 2 (2026) Chris Hemsworth, Halle Berry, Mark Ruffalo

author: IGN
description:
In this snippet from NVC Episode 794, We make some bold predictions and guess everything we think is coming to the Switch 2 this year, from Pokemon’s 30th anniversary, to Zelda’s 40th, whats next for Splatoon, and a lot more.

Check out the full episode here - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=pHRtYkFVxbI

This weeks show is hosted by Logan Plant, Seth Macy, Rebekah Valentine, Brian Altano, and is produced by Nick Maillet
title: Our Boldest Nintendo 2026 Predictions - NVC Clips

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the Early Access Release Date Teaser Trailer for Deep Fringe, a deep tactical turn-based RPG developed by Bosoneon Studio. Players will assemble a powerful faction in a biopunk wasteland to engage in brutal battles, destroy the terrain, and reign victorious. Deep Fringe is launching on January 15 for PC (Steam) in Early Access.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Deep Fringe - Official Early Access Release Date Teaser Trailer

author: IGN
description:
After more than a year in early access, Hades 2 finally hit version 1.0 last September on PC, Nintendo Switch, and Switch 2. And because it spent so long evolving before full release, the game you can play today is very different from its original 2024 soft launch.

From major gameplay tuning and new weapon aspects to an entirely new surface route that takes Melinoe all the way to Mount Olympus, Supergiant Games has steadily expanded and refined Hades 2 both before and after its 1.0 launch. If you bounced off early access, or haven’t checked in since, there’s a lot you’ve missed.
title: Hades 2: Everything Major Added Since Launch

author: IGN
description:
Code Violet reviewed by Jarrett Green on PlayStation 5.

Code Violet is not the Dino Crisis successor you may have hoped for. It doesn't even clear the bar of being a successful clone of the various other third-person shooters it cribs most of its ideas from. Its dated map layouts and visual style let its predecessors down. The only weight I felt from its convoluted story and flat, empty characters were on my eyelids. Its anemic host of enemies are dull, and far more scary are the amount of bugs that were in this review build that, though a priority on developer TeamKill Media’s list of fixes, hit Code Violet’s balance and pacing like a life-ending comet from outer space.
title: Code Violet Review

author: IGN
description:
Spoilers follow for Primal!

Genndy Tartakovsky, the creator of such classics of animation as Dexter's Laboratory, Samurai Jack, and Star Wars: Clone Wars, is back with Primal Season 3, which is both a continuation and a reset for his caveman-and-dinosaur epic.

We spoke with the animator about his decision to bring back main character Spear (Aaron LaPlante) -- despite his being killed off at the end of Season 2. What did it take to make a show about a zombified version of Spear? And how much of our beloved caveman is still lurking inside that desiccated, hulking corpse? Watch the video to hear Tartakovsky's thoughts.

We also discuss what happened to Fang (Joel Valentine), the T-rex who became Spear's best friend, and whether or not she might return this season. Plus, whatever happened to the anthology version of Primal that was supposed to serve as Season 3? We've got all that and more, so watch the full interview!

#IGN
title: 'Where's Fang!?' | Primal Season 3 Interview w Creator Genndy Tartakovsky

description:
CES is all about the toys and they had a strong showing for sex toys as well. We got to see demos from The Handy 2 Pro, MotorBunny, Fappy Bird, The Fluffer app and products from Lovense. For all of the best from CES 2026 in Las Vegas, keep it locked to IGN

author: IGN
description:
CES always has the biggest and best of all TV's and gaming monitors and this year was no different. We saw the best of OLED, RGB, the thinnest tvs, the biggest tvs, the fastest gaming monitors and more. Specifically we got to look at the LG Wallpaper TV lg oled evow6, LG Micro RGB evo, Hisense 163 MX, Hisense 116 uxs, Phantom blade zero, Hisense gx pro, Hisense 32 gx and even got to demo Phantom Blade Zero. For all of the best from CES 2026 in Las Vegas keep it locked to IGN.

#IGN #CES2026
title: The Coolest (and Biggest!) TV's and Gaming Monitors We Saw at CES 2026

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the Gameplay Trailer for Deep Dish Dungeon, a survival exploration dungeon crawling game developed by Behold Studios. Players will trek into the depths of dungeons to solve puzzles, craft items for survival, and unravel the mysteries of the deep alone or with friends in co-op. Deep Dish Dungeon is coming soon to PC (Steam).

#IGN #Gaming
title: Deep Dish Dungeon - Official Gameplay Trailer

author: IGN
description: Don't miss the Africa Team Pass Trailer for UFL, a free-to-play football (soccer) arcade game developed by XTEN Limited. Players can now access the new Africa Team Pass with a new progression pass inspired by African football culture. Play in matches to achieve daily and weekly challenges for rewards such as legendary Jay-Jay Okocha player cards, resources to develop squads, and more. The Africa Team Pass for UFL is available now through February 5 for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam).
title: UFL - Official Africa Team Pass Trailer
